param.label: Ship From Zip Code
param.name: OVERRIDE_SOURCE_ZIP
param.description: Enter a zip code to override the Vendor ship from zip code

param.label: Show Delivery Days Quote?
param.name: SHOW_DELIVERY_DAYS_QUOTE
param.description: Enable the Quote-to-Delivery Note next to each Shipping Method that shows the days.

param.label: Show Delivery ETA Quote?
param.name: SHOW_DELIVERY_ETA_QUOTE
param.description: Enable the Quote-to-Delivery Note next to each Shipping Method that shows the ETA, or Estimated Time of Arrival.

param.label: Show Delivery Warning?
param.name: SHOW_DELIVERY_WARNING
param.description: Enable the Quote-to-Delivery Warning under each Shipping Method that shows the message from the shipper.

param.name: @spacer
param.default: Enable each UPS shipping method you would like to offer to customers. Then enter a in percent. (ex. 12.50%)
